text: yah karo jabaki vah apanee or se chain pradaan kar tumhen oongh se dhank raha tha aur vah aakaash se tumapar paanee barasa raha tha, taaki usake dvaara tumhen achchhee tarah paak kare aur shaitaan kee gandagee tumase door kare aur tumhaare dilon ko mazaboot kare aur usake dvaara tumhaare qadamon ko jama de
